metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1853 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Almanah Diary 0.9.0 and 0.10.0 does not encrypt the database when closed, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading the database.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1853` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

almanah - 0.10.0-1~exp2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: almanah package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.0-1~exp2').
